content.p: Our students' welfare and experience whilst studying in the School of Economics is of paramount importance. Current students have access to a range of resources and services to support them through their university life. Most of the information for current students can be found on the school's undergraduate and masters information hubs on Moodle, including the student handbook, module guides, assessment information, school contacts etc. Students should use their university login to access the site. There are also a number of resources available on the university webpages for current students. Below are some of the key links for and about our current students: Sir Clive Granger Building University of Nottingham University Park Nottingham, NG7 2RD
